link-text: Academic Men Explain Things to Me: You only got in because you're a girl...
link-description:
mansplained:

When I was a senior in high school, I got into MIT, a prestigious engineering school, during early admission and several boys, who also applied to MIT early but were either rejected or deferred, and even some girls, who did not apply, quite profusely told me that âthe only reason you got in is…

When imposter syndrome isn’t hard enough by itself.
